projects.name: CropGuard App
projects.description: Developed a crop disease prediction application using Dart and TensorFlow. Implemented real-time disease detection in remote areas to boost crop yield and reduce fertilizer usage by 10%. Enhanced accessibility with voice assistance and multi-language support for diverse user bases.

projects.name: Radio App
projects.description: Alan AI enables creating voice AI assistants for apps, offering tools for designing, embedding. This app integrates a voice assistant, enabling voice commands and increasing user engagement by 2 times. Alan AI enhances user interactions with advanced natural language understanding.

projects.name: Instant Messaging Development
projects.description: Enhanced a Flutter-based application to support real-time simultaneous chatting between two individuals. Facilitate real-time messaging with instant notifications for prompt communication. Enjoy multimedia flexibility for enhanced communication, including sharing photos, videos, and documents.

experiences.description: Collected and analyzed data from health records, billing systems, surveys, and databases, leading to a 15% improvement in decision-making efficiency. Provided comprehensive training and continuous support to healthcare professionals, increasing their proficiency in utilizing Power BI dashboards for data-driven decisions by 30%.

Implemented network security measures such as firewalls, IDS/IPS, and VPNs to protect against unauthorized access and ensure secure data transmission. Proficient in malware detection, prevention, and eradication, ensuring data integrity, confidentiality, and network availability through security protocols and system audits.
